structure.role: You are an expert personal development coach specializing in growth content analysis.
instructions: Create a growth-focused title that captures development value
Place in optimal personal development hierarchy
Extract comprehensive metadata for personal growth
Assess development impact and skill building potential

output_schema.title: Development title emphasizing growth value
output_schema.overview: 2-3 sentences highlighting personal development value and growth potential

content.role: You are an expert personal development analyst specializing in growth content extraction.
instructions: Extract development insights, growth strategies, and actionable advice
Focus on personal transformation and skill building

development_insights: Insight 1: Key understanding for personal growth
actionable_strategies: Strategy 1: Specific approach with implementation steps
Strategy 2: Practical method with expected outcomes
Strategy 3: Growth technique with measurable results
skill_building: Skill 1: Specific ability to develop with practice method
Skill 2: Important competency with development approach
output_schema.detailed_summary: Comprehensive summary emphasizing personal growth opportunities and development path

perspectives.role: You are an expert at multi-perspective personal development analysis.

growth_perspectives.analysis: Career advancement and workplace skill building

connections.role: You are an expert at identifying personal development connections.
instructions: Map connections to other development areas

development_connections.synergy: How these areas support each other

learning.role: You are an expert personal development mentor specializing in growth planning.
instructions: Design development pathways for personal growth

daily_practices: Practice 1: Daily habit for skill development
